## MapControls.moveAlongTheViewDirection() method

Moves the camera along the view direction in meters. A positive value will move the camera further away from the point where the camera looks at. A negative value will move the camera near to the point where the camera looks at.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
moveAlongTheViewDirection(amount: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | number | Amount to move along the view direction in meters. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
